Class: Settings

Settings()

new Settings()

Properties:
Name Type Description
theme_isEnabled boolean If true, will display placeholder to upload load and color picker.
theme_color string Company brand color of a tenant in RGBA. e.g. rgba(255,255,255,1)
emailData object Predefined data for emailsettings.
Properties
Name Type Description
fromEmail string From eMail.
displayName string Display name.
replyToEmail string Reply eMail.
tenantId string Tenant ID.
ugId string User group ID.
onSave function callback function which will be called upon save.
onCancel function callback function which will be called upon cancel.
Source:
  • settings.jsx, line 10
Example

Access component as a Library

	var Settings = SUREUI.components.Settings;
	var props = {
		theme_isEnabled: true,
		theme_color: "rgba(255,255,255,1)",
		emailData: {
			fromEmail: 'abc@nokia.com',
			displayName: 'Test',
			replyToEmail: 'qwe@nokia.com',
			tenantId: 'T0',
			ugId: 'default_UserGroup'
		},
		onSave: function (item) {
			console.log(item);
		},
		onCancel: function (item) {
		},
		onError: function (item) {
		}
	}
	var settingsComponent = React.createElement(Settings, props);
	ReactDOM.render(settingsComponent, document.getElementById("settingsView")); //container height is must to render the component
